trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> class is used to pass flags to the server to control search behavior.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> 類別 (Class) 用於將旗標傳遞至伺服器，以控制搜尋行為。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> enumeration value that specifies the search behavior.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> class using the specified search options.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption)" /> 建構函式使用指定的搜尋選項，建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.GetValue" /> method returns search option for this object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.GetValue" /> 方法會傳回這個物件的搜尋選項。

trans-unit.source: The search option associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 與這個控制項關聯的搜尋選項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.SearchOption" /> property contains one of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> enumeration that specifies the search behavior.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.SearchOption" /> 屬性包含可指定搜尋行為之其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> 列舉型別的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> enumeration that specifies the search behavior.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> 列舉型別的值，指定搜尋行為。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" />.
trans-unit.target: 該值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> 值。
